earn.earn_desc_1: Want to make money? Help me promote the project, complete daily tasks, and earn TON. It's simple and transparent.
earn.earn_desc_2: Compete with friends to see who can bring in more people and earn more TON. Each referral earns you 5% of their income.
earn.earn_desc_3: All referral payouts are in TON, straight from my pocket! The project's liquidity won't suffer!
